title: Should You Sell Your YouTube Channel?
description: The latest trend in the creator economy has been creators giving up equity in their channel in exchange for cash. Why is this happening, how are these deals structured, and what do creators need to know before agreeing to these deals? Hear it all on the latest episode of Creator Economics!
dc:creator: Reed Duchscher and Blake Robbins
itunes:summary: The latest trend in the creator economy has been creators giving up equity in their channel in exchange for cash. Why is this happening, how are these deals structured, and what do creators need to know before agreeing to these deals? Hear it all on the latest episode of Creator Economics!
